thread.title: Does struggle to meet NHS targets waste money, MSPs ask
thread.title_full: Does struggle to meet NHS targets waste money, MSPs ask - The Scotsman

author: scotsman.com
title: Does struggle to meet NHS targets waste money, MSPs ask
text:
1
Have your say MSPs have questioned whether pressure to meet performance targets in the NHS is resulting in the best use of public money.
Holyroodâ€™s health committee has called on the Scottish Government to consider whether there should be more flexibility around high-profile targets such as the four-hour A&E waiting time standard.
During an examination of health board budgets, the committee heard resources were often diverted if there was a risk a target would be missed, to the possible detriment of other projects.
